snippet: The Swiss tennis player, who exited a tournament in Madrid as his wife gave birth to their second pair of twins, is expected to return for the French Open.
lead_paragraph: The Swiss tennis player, who exited a tournament in Madrid as his wife gave birth to their second pair of twins, is expected to return for the French Open.

headline.main: A Second Set (of Twins) Goes to Federer
headline.print_headline: A Second Set (of Twins) Goes to Federer
